name: Turboden
goal:
Turboden is a leading company in the development and production of ORC (Organic Rankine Cycle) turbogenerators for the combined generation of heat and power from renewable sources (biomass, geothermal, solar) and heat recovery from industrial processes.
Founded in 1980, Turboden has been part of the Mitsubishi Heavy Industries group since 2013.
So far Turboden has installed more than 389 plants worldwide.
interests: Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Energy Union, 2030 Framework for climate and energy policies, ETS, Circular Economy, Clean Energy Package.
